name: Cacus Giant
description: A huge giant characterized by massive physique and a terrifying presence, often associated with fire and chaos.
memorable: The Cacus Giant's capacity to unleash fire upon death creates a hazardous environment for its foes.
goals: To dominate its surroundings and eliminate any threats through brute force and fiery attacks.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other chaotic creatures or serve as a protector of chaotic realms.
environment: Often found in mountainous or volcanic regions where fire is prevalent.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores enable powerful melee attacks and exceptional endurance.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence scores hinder mobility and tactical capabilities.
attacks: Can make two greatclub strikes from 10 feet away or hurl massive rocks for devastating damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, exhaling fire in a 30-foot cone to damage multiple targets severely.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception score of 15, making it quite aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Survival, which enhances its awareness and survival skills in the wilderness.
additional_information: Immunity to fire damage grants it extra protection in combat.
The Final Breath ability causes area damage upon its death.
Can reach attacking enemies from afar by hurling rocks.
Has decent endurance with 138 hit points.
Good Wisdom score results in reasonable situational awareness.
test_queries: large chaotic giant immune to fire
hulking giant that attacks with a club
